Posts.Content: It's ok to find it hard work coping. I think when someone you love gets ill in this way, it can be really hard to cope because it becomes all you can think about. It is mentally exhausting. It's pretty sttressful. I'm sure it will ease, as you get used to the changes with treatments etc, and there are loads of great people here to help you cope, or just to talk to so that you halp yourself cope. xxx
Posts.Title: Trouble coping
